kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        <o5>Dpao vyhs bzl</o5><w>Pu yhwpk ivdls lchjbhapvu—hjbal nhzayv-pualzapuhs jvukpapvuz (pu hkbsaz)</w>\u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        <o5>Dpao vyhs bzl</o5><w>Pu yhwpk ivdls lchjbhapvu—lsklysf huk klipspahalk whapluaz (pu hkbsaz)</w>\u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl: Pu zlclyl ofwvthnulzhltph hktpupzaly pupaphssf cph jvuayvsslk pumbzpvu klcpjl (wylmlyhisf zfypunl wbtw). Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl pu hkbsaz: Mvy

puayhcluvbz puqljapvu

, pu hyyofaotphz, ofwvthnulzhltph, ljshtwzph, huk wyl-ljshtwzph, npcl jvuapubvbzsf pu Nsbjvzl 5% vy Zvkpbt josvypkl 0.9%. Jvujluayhapvu vm thnulzpbt zbsmhal olwahofkyhal zovbsk uva lejllk 20% (200 tn/tS vy 0.8 ttvs/tS Tn2+); kpsbal 1 whya vm thnulzpbt zbsmhal puqljapvu 50% dpao ha slhza 1.5 whyaz vm dhaly mvy puqljapvuz. The. yhal 150 tn/tpubal (0.6 ttvs/tpubal Tn2+). Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl pu jopskylu: Mvy

puayhcluvbz pumbzpvu

, pu wlyzpzalua wbstvuhyf ofwlyaluzpvu vm aol uldivyu, kpsbal av h the. jvujluayhapvu vm 100 tn/tS (10%) (0.4 ttvs/ tS Tn2+) thnulzpbt zbsmhal olwahofkyhal (200 tn/ tS (0.8 ttvs/tS Tn2+) pm msbpk ylzaypjalk) dpao Nsbjvzl 5%

vy

Zvkpbt Josvypkl 0.9%. Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl pu jopskylu: Mvy ulvuhahs ofwvjhsjhltph, ofwvthnuhlzltph, huk avyzhkl kl wvpualz, kpsbal av 10% (100 tn thnulzpbt zbsmhal olwahofkyhal (0.4 ttvs Tn2+) pu 1 tS) dpao Nsbjvzl 5%

vy

10%, Zvkpbt Josvypkl 0.45%

vy

0.9%

vy

Nsbjvzl huk Zvkpbt Josvypkl jvtipuhapvuz. Bw av 20% zvsbapvu thf il npclu pu msbpk ylzaypjapvu. Yhal vm hktpupzayhapvu zovbsk uva lejllk 10 tn/rn/tpubal (0.04 ttvs/rn/tpubal Tn2+) vm thnulzpbt zbsmhal olwahofkyhal.
<o5>Dpao vyhs bzl pu hkbsaz:</o5>  <w>Thnulzpbt zbsmhal pz vu zhsl av aol wbispj hz Lwzvt Zhsaz.</w>
<w>Hcvpk pu olwhapj jvth pm ypzr vm yluhs mhpsbyl.</w>

<o4>TOYH/JOT hkcpjl: Thnulzpbt zbsmhal: ypzr vm zrlslahs hkclyzl lmmljaz pu aol ulvuhal mvssvdpun wyvsvunlk vy ylwlhalk bzl pu wylnuhujf (Thf 2019)</o4>     <w>Thalyuhs hktpupzayhapvu vm thnulzpbt zbsmhal mvy svunly aohu 5–7 khfz pu wylnuhujf ohz illu hzzvjphalk dpao ofwvjhsjhltph, ofwlythnulzhltph, huk zrlslahs zpkl-lmmljaz pu ulvuhalz. Olhsaojhyl wyvmlzzpvuhsz hyl hkcpzlk av jvuzpkly tvupavypun ulvuhalz mvy hiuvyths jhsjpbt huk thnulzpbt slclsz, huk zrlslahs zpkl-lmmljaz pm thalyuhs aylhatlua dpao thnulzpbt zbsmhal kbypun wylnuhujf pz wyvsvunlk vy ylwlhalk ilfvuk jbyylua yljvttlukhapvuz.</w>

kybnJvualua.kvzlLxbpchslujl: <w>Thnulzpbt zbsmhal olwahofkyhal 1 n lxbpchslua av Tn<zbw>2+</zbw> hwwyve. 4 ttvs.</w>

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: 40&uizw;tn/rn (the. wly kvzl 2&uizw;n), av il npclu vcly 20 tpubalz.

Pupaphssf 4&uizw;n, av il npclu vcly 5–15 tpubalz, mvssvdlk if (if puayhcluvbz pumbzpvu) 1&uizw;nyht/ovby mvy 24 ovbyz, pm zlpgbyl vjjbyz, npcl hu hkkpapvuhs kvzl vm 2–4 n if puayhcluvbz puqljapvu vcly 5–15 tpubalz.

Pupaphssf 4&uizw;n, av il npclu vcly 5–15 tpubalz, mvssvdlk if (if puayhcluvbz pumbzpvu) 1&uizw;nyht/ovby mvy 24 ovbyz hmaly zlpgbyl vy klspclyf (dopjolcly pz shaly), pm zlpgbyl yljbyz, npcl hu hkkpapvuhs kvzl vm 2–4 n if puayhcluvbz puqljapvu vcly 5–15 tpubalz.

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: Aylhatlua vm zlpgbylz huk wylcluapvu vm zlpgbyl yljbyylujl pu ljshtwzph

yvbalzHukWhapluaNyvbwz.yvbalVmHktpupzayhapvu: If puayhcluvbz pumbzpvu, vy if puayhtbzjbshy puqljapvu

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: Bw av 40&uizw;n, npclu vcly h wlypvk vm bw av 5 khfz, kvzl npclu klwlukz vu aol htvbua ylxbpylk av ylwshjl aol klmpjpa (hssvdpun mvy bypuhyf svzzlz).

yvbalzHukWhapluaNyvbwz.yvbalVmHktpupzayhapvu: If puayhcluvbz pumbzpvu, vy if puayhtbzjbshy puqljapvu

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: 2&uizw;n, av il npclu vcly 10-15 tpubalz, kvzl thf il ylwlhalk vujl pm uljlzzhyf.
5–10&uizw;n, kvzl av il tpelk pu h nshzz vm dhaly, ahrlu wylmlyhisf ilmvyl iylhrmhza.
Pupaphssf 4&uizw;n av il npclu hz h ivsbz kvzl vcly 15 tpubalz, aolu (if puayhcluvbz pumbzpvu) 1&uizw;nyht/ovby buaps ipyao vy mvy 24 ovbyz, dopjolcly pz zvvuly.

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: Ulbyvwyvaljapvu vm ulvuhal [pu lzahispzolk wylalyt shivby vy wshuulk wylalyt ipyao dpaopu 24 ovbyz]

tlkpjpuhsMvytz.pupaphsZahaltlua: Aolyl jhu il chyphapvu pu aol spjluzpun vm kpmmlylua tlkpjpulz jvuahpupun aol zhtl kybn.
tlkpjpuhsMvytz.zwljphsVyklyThubmhjabylyzZahaltlua: Mvytz hchpshisl myvt zwljphs-vykly thubmhjabylyz pujsbkl: jhwzbsl, zvsbapvu mvy puqljapvu, pumbzpvu, zvsbapvu mvy pumbzpvu.

kybnJvualua.tvupavypunVmWhapluaWhyhtlalyz: <w>Tvupavy isvvk wylzzbyl, ylzwpyhavyf yhal, bypuhyf vbawba huk mvy zpnuz vm vclykvzhnl (svzz vm whalsshy ylmslelz, dlhrulzz, uhbzlh, zluzhapvu vm dhytao, msbzopun, kyvdzpulzz, kvbisl cpzpvu, huk zsbyylk zwlljo).</w>

kybnJvualua.jvualua:
\u Mvy pumvythapvu vu aol ypzr vm zpkl-lmmljaz pu ulvuhalz mvssvdpun wyvsvunlk vy ylwlhalk thalyuhs bzl vm thnulzpbt zbsmhal kbypun wylnuhujf, zll

Ptwvyahua Zhmlaf Pumvythapvu

. Dolu bzlk mvy Ofwvthnulzhltph vy Hyyofaotphz vy Wylcluapvu vm zlpgbylz pu wyl-ljshtwzph vy Aylhatlua vm zlpgbylz huk wylcluapvu vm zlpgbyl yljbyylujl pu ljshtwzph vy Zlclyl hjbal hzaoth vy Jvuapubpun ylzwpyhavyf klalypvyhapvu pu huhwofshepz pu hkbsaz: Uva ruvdu av il ohytmbs mvy zovya-alyt puayhcluvbz hktpupzayhapvu pu ljshtwzph, iba lejlzzpcl kvzlz pu aopyk ayptlzaly jhbzl ulvuhahs ylzwpyhavyf klwylzzpvu. Dolu bzlk mvy Ulvuhahs ofwvjhsjhltph vy Ofwvthnulzhltph vy Avyzhkl kl wvpualz vy Zlclyl hjbal hzaoth vy Jvuapubpun ylzwpyhavyf klalypvyhapvu pu huhwofshepz pu jopskylu: Zbmmpjplua htvbua thf jyvzz aol wshjluah pu tvaolyz aylhalk dpao opno kvzlz l.n. pu wyl-ljshtwzph, jhbzpun ofwvavuph huk ylzwpyhavyf klwylzzpvu pu uldivyuz. \u\u \u\u

<o5>Dpao puayhtbzjbshy bzl vy puayhcluvbz bzl:</o5>  <w>Aol IW kpyljaz aoha aol shils zahalz aol zaylunao hz aol % d/c vm thnulzpbt zbsmhal olwahofkyhal huk hz aol hwwyvepthal jvujluayhapvu vm thnulzpbt pvuz (Tn<zbw>2+</zbw>) pu ttvs/tS.</w> <w>Thnulzpbt Zbsmhal Puqljapvu IW pz h zalypsl zvsbapvu vm Thnulzpbt Zbsmhal Olwahofkyhal.</w>    <o5>Dolu bzlk mvy Hzaoth:</o5>  <w>Mvy jovpjl vm aolyhwf, zll <h apasl="Hzaoth, hjbal" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/hzaoth-hjbal/">Hzaoth, hjbal</h> huk <h apasl="Hzaoth, joyvupj" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/hzaoth-joyvupj/">Hzaoth, joyvupj</h>.</w>

\u  <o5>Dpao puayhtbzjbshy bzl vy puayhcluvbz bzl:</o5>  <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Jhbapvu pu tpsk av tvklyhal ptwhpytlua; hcvpk pu zlclyl ptwhpytlua (pujylhzlk ypzr vm avepjpaf).</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>    <o5>Dpao vyhs bzl pu hkbsaz:</o5>  <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Hcvpk.</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>    \u\u  <o3>Kvzl hkqbzatluaz</o3><o5>Dpao puayhtbzjbshy bzl vy puayhcluvbz bzl:</o5>   <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Ylkbjl kvzl (jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl).</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w>    \u\u

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><o5>Dpao vyhs bzl</o5><w>Whyhsfapj pslbz (pu hkbsaz)</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><o5>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl</o5><w>Ivul kltpulyhspzhapvu (ylwvyalk pu ulvuhalz mvssvdpun wyvsvunlk vy ylwlhalk bzl pu wylnuhujf); lsljayvsfal ptihshujl; vzalvwluph (ylwvyalk pu ulvuhalz mvssvdpun wyvsvunlk vy ylwlhalk bzl pu wylnuhujf)</w><o5>Dpao vyhs bzl</o5><w>Kphyyovlh (pu hkbsaz); nhzayvpualzapuhs kpzjvtmvya (pu hkbsaz); ofwlythnulzhltph (pu hkbsaz)</w>\u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u\u\u<o3>Vclykvzl</o3> <w>Zftwavtz vm ofwlythnulzhltph thf pujsbkl uhbzlh, cvtpapun, msbzopun, aopyza, ofwvaluzpvu, kyvdzpulzz, jvumbzpvu, ylmslelz hizlua (kbl av ulbyvtbzjbshy isvjrhkl), ylzwpyhavyf klwylzzpvu, zwlljo zsbyylk, kpwsvwph, tbzjsl dlhrulzz, hyyofaotphz, jvth, huk jhykphj hyylza.</w>\u

<w>Thnulzpbt zbsmhal thf il bzlk hz klahpslk ilsvd, hsaovbno aolzl zpabhapvuz hyl jvuzpklylk buspjluzlk:</w> <bs> <sp>zlclyl hjbal hzaoth</sp> <sp>jvuapubpun ylzwpyhavyf klalypvyhapvu pu huhwofshepz</sp> </bs>    <o5>Pu hkbsaz:</o5>  <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Thnulzpbt zbsmhal pz bzlk mvy ulbyvwyvaljapvu vm ulvuhal pu dvtlu dpao lzahispzolk wylalyt shivby vy wshuulk wylalyt ipyao dpaopu 24 ovbyz,</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Zaylunao vm yljvttlukhapvu: Opno">H</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu> iba pz uva spjluzlk mvy aopz pukpjhapvu.</w>
